name: electron-typescript-template
description: A template repo for building Electron apps with TypeScript using Electron Builder

scripts.build:win: yarn run build:tsc && node electron-builder-proxy.js -t:w portable,nsis,zip -a x64,ia32
scripts.build:mac: yarn run build:tsc && node electron-builder-proxy.js -t:m default -a x64,ia32
scripts.build:linux: yarn run build:tsc && node electron-builder-proxy.js -t:l AppImage -a x64,ia32
scripts.release: yarn run build:tsc && node electron-builder-proxy.js -t:w portable,nsis,zip -a x64,ia32 --publish

author: Steven Fontaine
